summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Vishnu Calix fitness application. Backend APIs mostly functional with some issues. Frontend UI loads correctly with working contact form. Authentication system functional but AI features experiencing timeouts.

critical_bugs.issue: Add progress entry expects user_id in request body but should be set automatically from authenticated user

timeout_issues.issue: AI-powered endpoints timing out after 30 seconds
timeout_issues.likely_cause: Slow GPT-5 API responses or network issues
timeout_issues.impact: AI Coach, Workout Planner, and Diet Planner features not working

integration_issues.issue: Auth page redirects to home when accessed directly, but works via login button
integration_issues.impact: Minor - authentication still works via navigation

passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section, features, about, and CTA
Workout and diet plan listing works
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix AI timeout issues - investigate GPT-5 API integration, consider increasing timeout limits or implementing async processing. The Emergent LLM key appears to be configured correctly but AI endpoints are not responding within 30 seconds.

success_percentage.backend: 60% - Core APIs work, AI features timeout
success_percentage.frontend: 85% - UI loads correctly, contact form works, minor routing issue
